description: This file defines an interface IUserRepository for user-related database operations, including methods for retrieving users by email or ID, adding a user, and saving changes.

methods.name: GetByEmailAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a user by email with optional cancellation support.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a user by ID with optional cancellation support.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously adds a new user to the repository with optional cancellation support.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously persists changes made in the repository with optional cancellation support.
